item.title: Blade X Zombies Codes (October 2025)
item.content:encoded:
Use these Roblox Blade X Zombies monthly redeem codes for October 2025 to get plenty of free cash, giving you the freedom to buy as many weapons as you desire.

Blade X Zombies is a popular horror-themed survival game on Roblox that has certain similarities to popular entries to the genre, like Hunty Zombie. One of the things that makes Blade X Zombies stand out is the Japanese anime-style setting, with not just the characters and gameplay but even the map looking like it‚Äôs straight out of post-apocalyptic Japan. Like with other zombie survival games, the main objective of Blade X Zombies is to survive as long as possible. The only hitch comes in the form of hordes upon hordes of zombies out to get you, meaning that having the best weapons and items is of utmost importance. 

This is where these Blade X Zombies codes can be helpful to the players. They can be used by newer or more experienced players, offering a solid boost in terms of cash. This cash can be used in multiple ways, including purchasing new weapons and upgrading existing ones. Whether you‚Äôre playing alone or with a group of friends, using the codes is certainly recommended. 

Active Blade X Zombies Codes

Expired Blade X Zombies Codes

  • UPD1.5 ‚Äì 10k cash
  • ALPHA1 ‚Äì 5k cash
  • UPD1 ‚Äì 5k cash

How To Redeem Blade X Zombies Codes

Redeeming codes in Blade X Zombies is a fairly simple process with no prerequisite steps. It‚Äôs just a matter of navigating through the menus and inputting one of the active codes into the correct text box. For players who may be new to the Roblox ecosystem, however, here‚Äôs a detailed step-by-step guide to redeeming the codes:

  1. Launch Roblox and open up Blade X Zombies.
  2. Click on the ‚ÄòCodes‚Äô button on the top left.
  3. Input one of the active codes given above into the text box.
  4. Click the ‚ÄòClaim‚Äô button to receive your rewards.

How To Get More Blade X Zombies Codes

New codes are released during updates or special events, so keeping track of the developer‚Äôs socials and official Discord server might be a good idea. However, skimming through all the other information on those platforms to find the codes could be a hassle. That‚Äôs why we recommend that all players keep this page bookmarked for future reference, as we update it as soon as any new codes release.

item.title: Pok√©mon TCG Pocket Advance Ticket Finally Has A Use After One Year
item.content:encoded:
Chances are, you‚Äôve had the Advance Ticket sitting idly in your Pok√©mon TCG Pocket inventory for the best part of a year. The mysterious item has left everyone confused, but not anymore.

It‚Äôs been 12 months since Pok√©mon TCG Pocket launched. The free-to-play card-collecting and pack-opening feast has provided daily joy, and this is thanks to numerous new card sets, features, and fun battling. Something more Unown than the Pok√©mon itself is the Advance Ticket‚Äîwhich is about to be redeemed.

Advance Ticket Purposes Revealed For Pok√©mon TCG Pocket

A random draw is set to take place very soon, which will see very Pokemon TCG Pocket users with an Advanced Ticket be rewarded for their patience with a set number of Hourglasses.

‚ÄúWe‚Äôll be holding a drawing for players, so please make sure to check your Gifts in-game to see your rewards,‚Äù said the official X page.

The random draw will happen at 11 PM PDT on October 29, and the prizes are divided into three different potential outcomes:

  • 1st Prize: 1,200 Pack Hourglasses for 100 lucky winners.
  • 2nd Prize: 120 Pack Hourglasses for 10,000 lucky winners.
  • 3rd Prize: 24 Pack Hourglasses for all players.

Whatever the result, if you have the Advanced Ticket in your possession, you are guaranteed to get some Pack Hourglasses. Obviously, we‚Äôd all love to be the recipient of 2nd Prize, let alone 1st Prize.

Interestingly, according to the small print, even if you don‚Äôt have the Advance Ticket: ‚ÄúThe 3rd prize will also be distributed to players with no advance ticket.‚Äù

If you‚Äôve been waiting to see what the Advance Ticket does, do you feel it‚Äôs fair that players without it still get Packs? Or are you disappointed with the Advance Ticket reveal in general? Leave a comment, and then head over and join the Insider Gaming Discord Server.

Also, be sure to check out our complete Pok√©mon TCG Pocket B1 Mega Rising hub featuring details on its release date, start time, and which cards are being added in the new main set.
